channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EasyEvent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EasyEvent

item.title: CVE-2024-3628|2024-07-30T15:17:06.940Z -- unknown -- easyevent
item.description: The EasyEvent WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed

item.title: CVE-2024-3628|2024-05-07T06:00:01.626Z -- unknown -- easyevent
item.description: The EasyEvent WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
